description: Complete any venue, bar or restaurant with our quality bench seating. Create any style, size or shape you need with our bench seating choices including plain back, fluted back, and button back options. Hand made and hand upholstered in bold fabrics or classic finishes, we can supply bench seating to your exact requirements. All items which contain foam and/or fabric are CRIB 5 Certified unless otherwise stated.
name: Bench, Booth & Banquet Seating
